articles.title: Kebersihan sebagian dari iman, kekotoran dari imin
articles.description: Peilaku kebersihan sehari-hari yang tidak mencerminkan keimanan yang laku dalam sikap akademika.

articles.author: Matt Simon
articles.title: AI Magic Makes Century-Old Films Look New
articles.description: Denis Shiryaev uses algorithms to colorize and sharpen old movies, bumping them up to a smooth 60 frames per second. The result is a stunning glimpse at the past.
articles.content: That said, when it comes to Shirayaevs updates on the Mills and Lumiere brothers historical films, I don't know that they're honestly adding that much, Prelinger adds. But it's fiction, moving archiv… [+2727 chars]

articles.title: Plot Twist! Why 2004 Was a Surprising Year for Movies
articles.description: Before franchises dominated completely, great actors joined flashy directors in originals like “Collateral” and M. Night Shyamalan’s “The Village.”
